sentences.chinese: 巴黎和北京結成姊妹城市。
在所有的姊妹中她是佼佼者。

sentences.english: Pray for Ms. Xiu Yun Lin and her new born baby Grace.
sentences.chinese: 爲林秀雲姊妹及初生女兒嘉盈禱告。

sentences.english: He has quite a few brothers and sisters.
Thanks to God for bringing the missionary teams to Fiji. They did open a new page here.
sentences.chinese: 感謝神，使用團隊的弟兄姊妹，爲斐濟展開新一頁。

sentences.english: This paper is a companion volume of "The wear failure analysis of phosphorus cast iron cylinder".
sentences.chinese: 本文是“高磷鑄鐵汽缸套磨損失效分析”的姊妹篇。

sentences.english: Please remember brother Eric Lin's ministry in your prayers.
sentences.chinese: 請弟兄姊妹爲林春騰弟兄的事奉禱告。

sentences.english: The guide is a brother publication to Pregnant Pause, released earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 本書也是今年稍早出版的《暫停懷孕》的姊妹篇。

sentences.english: She have as many as seven sisters.
Her high height sets her apart from her sisters.
sentences.chinese: 高高的個子使她在其姊妹中分外引人注目。

sentences.english: My cousin is not part of my nuclear household.
sentences.chinese: 我的堂表兄弟姊妹並否則核心家裏成員的一部份。

sentences.english: We are an enviable good students, good friends, good like sisters.
sentences.chinese: 我們是令人羨慕的好同學，好朋友，好的似姊妹。

sentences.english: Ah, it was just one girl of the three witch sisters who loved the man.
sentences.chinese: 啊，三姊妹的一個人的魔女愛上了一個男人。

sentences.english: Randall has always had a good relationship with his siblings.
sentences.chinese: 藍道和兄弟姊妹的感情一直都很好。

sentences.english: Over 40 articles available, including devotions and testimonies.
sentences.chinese: 超過四十章文章，包括靈脩篇，和弟兄姊妹的見證。

definition: older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
